attributes.action: Give the state pension and company pension schemes a fairer crack of whip
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Pensions should with savings still be benifcial to pepple on pensions whetehr early retired or not, a cap of £6000 per anum in pension and savings is unfair. and should get if unemployed more than just NI credits.
But full JSA or incapicity payments plus housing and council tax benefits.
Where some between 16-30 who do not attend job centres, fleece system by getting cash in hand, and do not sign on at all, as they feel they earn more doing nothing over £300 per week on benefits key areas for this are in Northants,Oxfordshire and large cities beggars earn more than pensioners
